summary.para: Creates a local object of a specified class and returns a pointer to a specified interface on the object.

param.name: pUnkOuter
param.para: A pointer to the interface that aggregates the object created by this function, or NULL if no aggregation is desired.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to the IID of the interface the created object should return.

param.name: ppv
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of the pointer to the interface requested in riid.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method can be used with .

summary.para: Exposes a method that creates an object of a specified class.
